2025-06-17T16:17:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that as informed by the Mainland's Railway Authorities, the following adjustments will be made to train services:

- From July 1, 2025, to facilitate improvement work in Mainland Section, train service to and from Qingsheng will be temporarily adjusted to one northbound and one southbound train per day. 

- Temporary Suspension of Advance Ticket Sales of the trains listed below for July 1 and onwards:
To/From Shanghai Hongqiao: G100, G99
To/From Xianbei: G826/7, G828/5
To Tianjinxi: G306
To Zhanjiangxi: G6048/5
To Shantou: G6578/5
Departing from Zhangjiajiexi: G6079

- In addition, the schedules of some train services will be adjusted starting July 1. 

- For information, please visit the official 12306 website (12306. cn) or mobile app, High Speed Rail website or mobile app.
2025-06-17T16:17:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，內地鐵路部門通報，列車服務將作出以下調整： 

- 由2025年7月1日起，來往慶盛的列車服務因配合內地段工程需要，將暫時提供每日北行及南行各一班列車服務。

- 下列車次於7月1日及以後的車票預售將暫時延後：
來往上海虹橋：G100,G99
來往西安北：G826/7,G828/5
前往天津西：G306
前往湛江西：G6048/5
前往汕頭：G6578/5
由張家界西出發：G6079

- 此外，部份列車班次將於7月1日起調整時間。

- 有關資料請瀏覽12306官方網站(12306.cn)或使用手機應用程式、高速鐵路網頁及手機應用程式。

2025-06-20T11:25:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that

As informed by the Mainland's Railway Authorities, from July 1, 2025, the High-Speed Rail (Hong Kong Section) timetable schedule will be updated, and the following adjustments will be made to intermediate stops on some routes:



- Shanghai Hongqiao Line: trains(G99/100) will add a stop at Jingdezhenbei;

- Xianbei Line: trains (G826/7 / G828/5) will add stops at Xianningbei and Luohexi; northbound trains (G826/7) will no longer stop at Hengshanxi, Yingdexi and Zhumadianxi. 

- Tianjinxi Line: northbound trains (G306) will no longer stop at Hengshanxi but will stop at Lechangdong instead. 

- Zhanjiangxi Line: northbound trains (G6048/5) will add a stop at Enping. 

- Shantou Line: northbound trains (G6578/5) will no longer stop at Kuitan. 

- Zhangjiajiexi Line: southbound trains (G6079) will add stops at Furongzhen and Leiyangxi. 



*Due to the scheduling arrangement of Mainland trains, northbound G100 and G6504, and southbound G99 and G6503 will be available for sale later. 



Please visit the official 12306 website (12306. cn) or mobile app, High Speed Rail website or mobile app for detailed information.  



Tickets are available for sale through the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app; appointed travel agents (Click here); or at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station.
2025-06-20T11:25:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，內地鐵路部門通報，高速鐵路（香港段）列車服務由2025年7月1日起使用新時間表運行，部分路綫將作出以下中途站調整： 



-上海虹橋綫： 列車(G99/100)*增停景德鎮北。

-西安北綫： 列車(G826/7 /G828/5)增停咸寧北及漯河西，北行列車(G826/7)不停衡山西、英德西及駐馬店西。

-天津西綫： 北行列車(G306)不停衡山西，改停樂昌東。

-湛江西綫： 北行列車(G6048/5)增停恩平。

-汕頭綫： 北行列車(G6578/5)不停葵潭。

-張家界西綫： 南行列車(G6079)增停芙蓉鎮及耒陽西。


*因應列車調度安排，北行車次G100,G6504，南行車次G99,G6503會延後開售。



請瀏覽12306官方網站（12306.cn）或使用手機應用程式、高速鐵路網頁及手機應用程式查看詳細資訊。

 

你可透過12306官方網站（12306.cn）或手機應用程式、指定代理（按此）或前往香港西九龍站購買車票。

2025-06-19T13:01:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that because of road closures near the station, Entrance/Exit C1 in Jordan Station is temporarily closed. Please use other Entrances/Exits.
2025-06-19T13:01:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，由於站外有封路措施，佐敦站C1出入口暫時關閉，請使用其他出入口。

2025-06-22T11:23:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知， 屯馬綫額外行車時間

2025-06-22T11:27:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that Due to a signalling equipment fault near Tai Wai Station, the total journey time between Tuen Mun Station and Wu Kai Sha Station could be extended by 15-20 minutes.
2025-06-22T11:27:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知， 由於大圍站附近信號設備故障,來往屯門站及烏溪沙站的行車時間預計需要額外15-20分鐘。

2025-06-22T11:48:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that due to a signalling equipment fault near Tai Wai Station, the total journey time from Tuen Mun Station to Wu Kai Sha Station could be extended by 5-8 minutes.
2025-06-22T11:48:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，由於大圍站附近信號設備故障,由屯門站往烏溪沙站的行車時間預計需要額外5-8分鐘。
